code:
<script src="https://cdn.onesignal.com/sdks/OneSignalSDK.js" async=""></script>
    <script>
        page = window.location.pathname.toLowerCase();

        var OneSignal = window.OneSignal || [];
        OneSignal.push(function() {
            OneSignal.init({
                appId: "1f182a4a-321d-49cd-be21-d9eb0425a480",
                notifyButton: {
                    enable: true,
                },
                allowLocalhostAsSecureOrigin: true,
            });

            if(page.includes('cebu' )){
                OneSignal.sendTag("Destination", "Cebu",);
            }
            else if(page.includes('clark')){
                OneSignal.sendTag("Destination", "Clark",);
            }
            else if(page.includes('dumaguete')){
                OneSignal.sendTag("Destination", "Dumaguete",);
            }
            else if(page.includes('puertoprincesa')){
                OneSignal.sendTag("Destination", "Puerto Princesa",);
            }
            else if(page.includes('tagaytay')){
                OneSignal.sendTag("Destination", "Tagaytay",);
            }
            else if(page.includes('questresidencescebu')){
                OneSignal.sendTag("Destination", "Quest Residences Cebu",);
            }
        });
    </script>
